hibernate-mapping.query: select consentTierResponse.consentTier.statement,consentTierResponse.response,consentTierResponse.consentTier.id from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Participant particiapant join particiapant.collectionProtocolRegistrationCollection cpr join cpr.consentTierResponseCollection consentTierResponse join consentTierResponse.consentTier consentTier where cpr.id=? order by consentTierResponse.consentTier.id asc

select cpr.signedConsentDocumentURL,consentWitness,cpr.consentSignatureDate from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.Specimen specimen join specimen.specimenCollectionGroup scg join scg.collectionProtocolRegistration cpr left join cpr.consentWitness consentWitness where specimen.id = ?

select cpr.signedConsentDocumentURL,consentWitness,cpr.consentSignatureDate from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr left join cpr.consentWitness consentWitness where cpr.id = ?
select cp.consentTierCollection from CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr join cpr.collectionProtocol cp where cpr.id = ?

select cpr.signedConsentDocumentURL,consentWitness,cpr.consentSignatureDate from edu.wustl.catissuecore.domain.SpecimenCollectionGroup scg join scg.collectionProtocolRegistration cpr left join cpr.consentWitness consentWitness where scg.id = ?
